page.title: 17BELLERBY SCHOOL EXHIBITION
page.content: {An account of the Exhibition of school {and village life held July 6th 1985 to {mark the closure of Bellerby C.E. {Primary School. Bellerby C.E. Primary School will close on July 19th 1985 after providing a place of learning for the children of Bellerby for 153 years.The original records of transactions made by Francis Walker who founded the school were on display as well as photographs dating back to 1872, rate books recording how much children paid for their lessons and how much salary the master received, log books, a copy book from 1852, an iron framed desk and bench, a 1911 examination paper, a set of tools belonging to a local besom maker, a set of shoemaker's patterns and many other memorabilia. {.......cont. {
